column4: ok people, I think we need to ask zxsykco what his current problem is and start over.
He's trying to install nvidia drivers
his problem is he's fsked up his xorg.conf and cannot get it working
getting warmer, but that still won't help
we told him to dpkg reconfig it
which he was, but stopped when he was asked where his video card was
are you using the ubuntu repo for wine, or the winehq one?
its from the Binary Universe repo, I've not added any others
er, did you have any ideas?
I usually just install the winehq repo, sudo apt-get install wine winetools, then run winetools to download all the required MS libs etc
I play wesnoth, vendetta online, and qgo
